data.title: Counties in California with more precipitation over the past year than average
data.meta_description: Using National Centers for Environmental Information data, Stacker identified counties in California that saw more precipitation in the past year than their long-term average.
data.text:
1 / 50

Canva

#50. Lassen County

- Precipitation over the past year: 24.6 inches

- Comparison to 1901-2000 average: 4.2 inches above average (#37 rainiest September-August period since 1895)

- Comparison to state's precipitation over past year: 6.3 inches below statewide average
